  • mechanical
  • View page source

mechanical¶

General functional algorithms for the design of pumps and motors.

biosteam.units.design_tools.mechanical.brake_efficiency(q)[source]¶

Return brake efficiency given flow rate in gpm.

biosteam.units.design_tools.mechanical.motor_efficiency(Pb)[source]¶

Return motor efficiency given brake power in hp.

biosteam.units.design_tools.mechanical.pump_efficiency(q, p)[source]¶

Return pump efficiency.

Parameters

  • q (float) – Volumetric flow rate in gpm.

  • p (float) – Power in hp.
